attributes.review: This app took a while to download, and once it finally did I noticed that there were multiple glitches and issues when trying to use this app.
attributes.title: Not A Good App

attributes.review: I downloaded this at the request of my mom, needless to say we all deleted soon enough. The trump app made my entire phone glitch and sent harassing notifications to our cellular devices. Please do not download this app.
attributes.title: unsafe

attributes.review: Really , banning TikTok how petty can you be trump. No one cares about this app, people care about TikTok and you shouldn’t take anyone’s entertainment away. Your horrible. This app is also very low quality and terrible.
attributes.title: This app is horrible, low quality.

attributes.review: Like really why? This is build as poorly as all of his business ventures. It’s not worth the download and if you really want to know his plans go to Twitter, just make sure you read the fact checks.
attributes.title: Please Why?

attributes.review: First when I opened the app I see a picture a Cheeto... like that is something I would see in a vending machine. This app is terrible and is so disorganized. President trump needs to find a different hobby instead of making an app. This is THE WORST APP I HAVE EVER SEEN!!
attributes.title: This app... I want to throw up

attributes.review: I was expecting to see what mr. orange does for our country and instead I ended up on the wall building bricks I AM HORRIFIED by this behavior and instantly regret everything it was cold and I think I now have hypothermia building bricks for no pay this is going to your manager 🍊Orange peel🍊
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: This app is making me feel very uncomfortable and my kids think it’s a game half of the stuff that is listed on this app is fake and offensive and I hate what this stuff is teaching my children this is all racist
attributes.title: Racist things about this app

attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping this I was going to stay informed, the app didn’t work at all. This app just shows a home screen but when I try to go to other parts of the app it doesn’t work.
attributes.title: Worst app not good

attributes.review: He is taking TikTok down just because China is getting the information and this app wants to send u messages this could be some random person don’t download it ok y’all we must defeat Donald trump who’s with me
attributes.title: Let’s take him down

attributes.review: I had got this app and I was exited to be informed about our, “wonderful president” but it started slowing down my phone and then I was getting too many notifications one after the other. I suggest not getting this app. 🤮🤮🤮 Trump
attributes.title: Me
